attributes.background: Charnock richard services has a acces road that leads the the services on bothe sides this is used regurly by residents and is due to close this will push hgvs amd tradfic i to surroumding small villages as they make there way to j27 at writington or j28 at leyland

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
